detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. "UDSServiceHandler Integration" component is only dealing with Task APIs, and the Task APIs are derived out from Architecture decisions. There are no SW requirements attached to it.

see Component Diagram "Requirements traceability" in SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.UDS_Service_Chorus.SW Architecture.UDSServiceHandler Integration.SW Requirements

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by using an identical component name. Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
